s.text: But it added Pakistan must "undertake a wide-ranging review of its foreign policy, economic planning and defence and security strategy" if it is to be "adequately prepared to meet the critical situation which India's brazen nuclear ambitions have created in South Asia."

In Japan, the daily Mainichi Shimbun condemned India in an editorial Thursday for "foolish actions, which go against the universal desire to wipe such weapons of mass destruction from the face of the Earth."
Asked by a surprised reporter if he really meant what he said, the minister replied, "Yes, I mean it.
